main.name: LKCYL
main.description:
Welcome to London Knanaya Catholic Association. We will be conducting a 3 day (2 nights) camp which will begin on Friday 30th September and ending on Sunday 2nd October, taking place in Moat Mount Outdoors Centre, Barnet Way, London NW7 5AL. 
 We currently have limited spaces and will be accepting people on a first come first service basis so please register for the camp providing your details below.
main.bio: I am just a really techy person who enjoys building stuff
main.contactmessage: Please fill in the form to register for the camp
